text: Poistine, Gospodne ispytaniye kosnetsya I vashikh dush, i vashego dobra, I vy uslyshite zhestokiye slova Ot tekh, kto Knigu poluchil do vas, (A ravno) i ot tekh, Kto idolov dlya pochitaniya sebe izbral. A yesli budete vy terpelivo-stoyki i stanete blagochestivy, Tak eto, istinno, iskhodit ot (vashey) tverdosti v delakh
